short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Gmail with Optimiser to create smooth transition of contacts and communication between two applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring in the power of Optimiser within your Gmail application, to enable your sales team optimise their time by using one application. 
What it does
-	Track important application email conversations relevant to Contacts within Optimiser
-	Eliminate time spent on data entry in two applications
-	Sales team can focus more on the most important KPI: Sales
-	Auto transfer contacts in To and cc in Optimiser application without having to enter manually into Optimiser
-	View Pipeline overview from the extension
-	View and manage Tasks associated with the contact from within Gmail
